about_the_game:
"A Vøid" Is A 3d Bullet-hell Action Game.
Embark on a journey across a vast, seamlessly connected field to reach the city on the other side of the river.

・a Barrage Of Bullets

The tension of just barely avoiding the barrage of bullets fired by the enemy. The more you evade, the stronger your magic fist becomes, and the more powerful the blow you strike, the more exhilarating it is.
The more you challenge the powerful barrage, the stronger and more dangerous it becomes. Enjoy the tantalizing battle where every action is accompanied by a great deal of tactical play.

・build Your Own.

Players can customize their own stats with skill items obtained from enemies.
Find your own best build on your journey.

・a story Of Reclaiming Memories

Alone in the world, having lost your memory, you just have to return to the city. But he remembers that he must return to the city.
As your journey progresses, you will discover the truth of why the world turned out the way it did. The truth will be revealed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700 or AMD RYZEN 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 3070 8G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
